{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10115v1", "title": "Heat Kernel methods in the first-order formalism", "summary": "In this paper, we extend the heat kernel methods to the first-order formalism
of gravity, specifically, in the language of differential forms. This allows us
to compute the effective dynamics of 4D gravity when the tetrad degrees of
freedom are integrated out. We show that the resulting effective field theory
is the Lorentz gauge theory.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th,gr-qc", "published": "2025-04-14T11:25:40Z"}
